opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Tennard v. Dretke, Director, Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

opinion:
541 U.S. 985

TENNARD
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 02-10038.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 19, 2004.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 540 U. S. 945.] Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted. Richard Burr, Esq., of Houston, Tex., is appointed to serve as counsel for petitioner in this case.
